verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to them that go down <WH3381> to Egypt <WH4714> for help <WH5833>, and rely <WH8172> on horses <WH5483>, and trust <WH982> in chariots <WH7393> because they are many <WH7227>, and in horsemen <WH6571> because they are very <WH3966> strong <WH6105>, but they look <WH8159> not unto the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>, neither seek <WH1875> Jehovah <WH3068>!

Yet he also is wise <WH2450>, and will bring <WH935> evil <WH7451>, and will not call back <WH5493> his words <WH1697>, but will arise <WH6965> against the house <WH1004> of the evil-doers <WH7489>, and against the help <WH5833> of them that work <WH6466> iniquity <WH205>.

Now the Egyptians <WH4714> are men <WH120>, and not God <WH410>; and their horses <WH5483> flesh <WH1320>, and not spirit <WH7307>: and when Jehovah <WH3068> shall stretch out <WH5186> his hand <WH3027>, both he that helpeth <WH5826> shall stumble <WH3782>, and he that is helped <WH5826> shall fall <WH5307>, and they all shall be consumed <WH3615> together <WH3162>.

For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> unto me <WH738>, As the lion and the young lion <WH3715> growling <WH1897> over his prey <WH2964>, if a multitude <WH4393> of shepherds <WH7462> be called forth <WH7121> against him <WH2865>, will not be dismayed at their voice <WH6963>, nor abase <WH6031> himself for the noise <WH1995> of them <WH3068>: so will Jehovah of hosts <WH6635> come down <WH3381> to fight <WH6633> upon mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>, and upon the hill thereof <WH1389>.

As birds <WH6833> hovering <WH5774>, so will Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> protect <WH1598> Jerusalem <WH3389>; he will protect <WH1598> and deliver <WH5337> it <WH6452>, he will pass over and preserve it <WH4422>.
Turn <WH7725> ye unto him from whom ye have deeply <WH6009> revolted <WH5627>, O children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

For in that day <WH3117> they shall cast away <WH3988> every man <WH376> his idols <WH457> of silver <WH3701>, and his idols <WH457> of gold <WH2091>, which your own hands <WH3027> have made <WH6213> unto you for a sin <WH2399>.

And the Assyrian <WH804> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>, not of man <WH376>; and the sword <WH2719>, not of men <WH120>, shall devour <WH398> him <WH5127>; and he shall flee from <WH6440> the sword <WH2719>, and his young men <WH970> shall become subject to taskwork <WH4522>.

And his rock <WH5553> shall pass away <WH5674> by reason of terror <WH4032>, and his princes <WH8269> shall be dismayed <WH2865> at the ensign <WH5251>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, whose fire <WH217> is in Zion <WH6726>, and his furnace <WH8574> in Jerusalem <WH3389>.
